original_text: Then she saw the king! He was standing in the king's place beside the pillar at the entrance of the temple. The army officers and the men with trumpets were standing beside the king. All the people of Judah were shouting with joy. There were musicians making music with trumpets and other musical instruments. They helped the people to sing and to praise God.
korean_text: 보매 왕이 성전 문 기둥 곁에 섰고 지휘관들과 나팔수들이 왕의 곁에 모셔 서 있으며 그 땅의 모든 백성들이 즐거워하여 나팔을 불며 노래하는 자들은 주악하며 찬송을 인도하는지라 이에 아달랴가 그의 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: He was standing in the king's place
at the entrance of the temple.
The army officers were standing beside the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 군대 장교들이 왕 옆에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The men with trumpets were standing beside the king.
All the people of Judah were shouting with joy.
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 백성이 기쁨으로 외치고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: with trumpets and other musical instruments.
They helped the people to sing
